author: Harry Boxer
title: 5 stocks to watch
text:
While the Chinese markets put a damper on ours on Tuesday, there are still some strong charts out there with more room to run.
Builders FirstSource Builders FirstSource Inc. BLDR, +2.81% popped out of a coil on Tuesday, up 56 cents to 14.93 on 1.4 million shares. The stock, which exploded in April on a merger with one of their competitors, and then moved sideways and consolidated, recently broke out to new highs before pulling back in a nice little bull coil. Watch for a move through the recent highs at 15.50, and then up toward 17.50, and then 20.00 potentially.
Check out Harryâ€™s video analysis of this stock on the last page.
